items.name: Turkish Grilled Burger
items.description: Juicy grilled chicken patty marinated in Turkish spices, served in a toasted bun with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, and a signature garlic-yogurt sauce.

items.name: Turkish BBQ Burger
items.description: Smoky BBQ chicken infused with Turkish herbs, flame-grilled and layered with crisp veggies, cheese, and a rich barbecue mayo in a soft burger bun.

items.name: Grilled Sandwich
items.description: Tender grilled chicken slices tucked in toasted bread with melted cheese, fresh veggies, and a zesty house sauce ‚Äì a hearty and satisfying bite.

items.name: BBQ Sandwich
items.description: Savory BBQ chicken shredded and stacked inside a crusty sandwich roll, finished with tangy slaw and smoky sauce for a bold flavor hit.

items.name: Egg Sandwich
items.description: Fluffy scrambled eggs combined with grilled chicken, layered in toasted bread with cheese, fresh greens, and a creamy dressing ‚Äì perfect for any time of day.

items.name: Turkish Panini
items.description: A crispy pressed panini filled with spiced Turkish-style chicken, melted cheese, and veggies, finished with a drizzle of garlic yogurt sauce.

items.name: Turkish Grilled Doner
items.description: Juicy grilled chicken doner, marinated in traditional Turkish spices, thinly sliced and served in warm flatbread with crisp veggies and garlic-yogurt sauce.

items.name: Turkish BBQ Doner
items.description: Smoky and tender BBQ chicken doner, slow-cooked with Turkish herbs, wrapped in flatbread with tangy pickles, onions, and signature BBQ mayo.

items.name: Tantuni
items.description: A spicy Turkish street-food classic ‚Äî finely chopped chicken saut√©ed in oil, peppers, and herbs, wrapped in lavash bread with fresh vegetables and sumac onions.

items.name: Lahmachun Wrap
items.description: A thin, soft Turkish flatbread topped with seasoned minced chicken, rolled with lettuce, onions, and a squeeze of lemon ‚Äî light, fresh, and flavorful.

items.name: Turkish Adana Kebab Wrap
items.description: Inspired by the famous Adana kebab ‚Äî spicy minced chicken skewers grilled to perfection, wrapped with garlic sauce, sumac onions, and salad in lavash.

items.name: Turkish Shawarma
items.description: Succulent layers of marinated grilled chicken shaved from the spit, wrapped in soft flatbread with garlic tahini sauce, pickles, and fresh veggies.

items.name: Taco
items.description: A soft taco shell filled with seasoned chicken, crisp lettuce, fresh veggies, and flavorful sauces ‚Äî a fusion twist with Turkish-inspired taste.

items.name: Simple Fries
items.description: Crispy golden fries, lightly salted and served hot ‚Äî the perfect classic side or snack.

items.name: Simple Fries L
items.description: Crispy golden fries, lightly salted and served hot ‚Äî the perfect classic side or snack in large size.

items.name: Doner Loaded Fries
items.description: Crispy fries loaded with juicy grilled chicken doner, drizzled with garlic-yogurt sauce and tangy toppings ‚Äî a bold and filling street-style treat.

items.name: Doner Loaded Fries L
items.description: Crispy fries loaded with juicy grilled chicken doner, drizzled with garlic-yogurt sauce and tangy toppings ‚Äî a bold and filling street-style treat in large size.

items.name: Simple Loaded Fries
items.description: A generous serving of fries topped with creamy sauces, melted cheese, and light seasoning ‚Äî simple, satisfying, and packed with flavor.

items.name: Spaghetti Pasta
items.description: Traditional spaghetti served in your choice of sauce (red, white, or pink), topped with herbs and grilled chicken.

items.name: Penne Pasta
items.description: Classic penne pasta served in your choice of red, white, or pink sauce ‚Äî garnished with herbs.

items.name: Alfredo Pasta
items.description: Silky and creamy Alfredo sauce over tender pasta, infused with garlic and parmesan, perfect for lovers of rich and comforting flavors.

items.name: Turkish Pasta Salad
items.description: A light and refreshing Mediterranean-style salad made with tender orzo pasta, crisp cucumbers, creamy feta cheese, juicy pomegranate seeds, and fresh herbs.

items.name: Anna Paul Turkish Pasta
items.description: Creamy Turkish-style pasta featuring penne tossed in a rich, spiced tomato-cream sauce, finished with herbs and optional chili flakes.

items.name: Turkish Karƒ±≈üƒ±k Platter
items.description: A flavorful mix of grilled and BBQ-style chicken chunks, served with aromatic rice, mashed potatoes, crispy fries, salad, yogurt, and a side of sauce.

items.name: Turkish K√∂ri Soslu Platter
items.description: Grilled chicken chunks smothered in rich Turkish-style curry sauce, served with seasoned rice, creamy mashed potatoes, fresh salad, crispy fries, yogurt, and house sauce.

items.name: Double Turkish Karƒ±≈üƒ±k Platter
items.description: A generous double portion of mixed grilled and BBQ chicken chunks, served with rice, salad, fries, mashed potatoes, yogurt, and sauce. (2 Persons)

items.name: Double K√∂ri Soslu Platter
items.description: Double the serving of our curry-infused grilled chicken chunks, paired with rice, mashed potatoes, fresh salad, fries, yogurt, and sauce. (2 Persons)

items.name: Menemen Bowl
items.description: A traditional Turkish scrambled egg dish with tomatoes, peppers, and spices, served with fresh bread.

items.name: Donner Platter
items.description: Succulent layers of marinated grilled chicken shaved from the spit, served with rice, salad, and signature sauces.

items.name: Turkish Tea
items.description: Turkish tea, traditionally brewed with black tea leaves, is light, aromatic, and gentle on the stomach. Known for aiding digestion, it can help soothe bloating and discomfort after meals. Rich in antioxidants, it supports heart health and may improve circulation.

items.name: Summer Drink
items.description: A vibrant, electric-blue mocktail made with a citrusy blend of lemon and lime, topped with a splash of soda and a hint of sweetness. Served chilled over ice it's the perfect mix of tangy and refreshing.

items.name: Mint Margarita
items.description: A cool and zesty twist on the classic margarita blended with fresh mint leaves, tangy lemon juice, and a splash of soda for a crisp, refreshing burst of flavor. Perfectly chilled and naturally invigorating.

items.name: Turkish Chicken Soup
items.description: A warm and comforting traditional Turkish chicken soup made with tender chicken pieces, aromatic herbs, and a squeeze of lemon for a soul-soothing experience.

items.name: Vanilla
items.description: Delicately shaved, cloud-soft ice cream infused with smooth, classic vanilla flavor. Light, creamy, and perfectly sweet ‚Äî a timeless treat that melts in your mouth like snow.

items.name: Chocolate Ice Cream
items.description: Indulgently smooth and airy chocolate-flavored ice cream, shaved to a snow-like softness. A dreamy delight for chocolate lovers ‚Äî rich in taste, light in texture, and topped with pure happiness.

items.name: Mango Ice Cream
items.description: A tropical twist on our signature snowflake ice cream ‚Äî infused with the rich, juicy flavor of ripe mangoes. Light as snow, smooth as cream, and bursting with sunny sweetness in every bite.

items.name: Coffee Ice Cream
items.description: Rich and aromatic coffee-flavored ice cream, shaved to snow-like perfection. A delightful blend of bold coffee essence and creamy sweetness ‚Äî perfect for coffee lovers seeking a cool, refreshing treat.
